casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Herbert M. HUNTER. No. 316P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, William D. Kenerly, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of June 2004 by Defendant for Stay of Sentence, With Bail:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2004."
